SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Board

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Board
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Board extends Object implements Serializable
Represents the game board, consisting of a grid of ObjectCards with associated coordinates. Provides methods for creating cells, checking if cells are empty, and removing ObjectCards from the board.
See Also:

    Board.Direction
    Represents the four possible directions: UP, DOWN, LEFT, and RIGHT.

  • Method Details

    • getGrid

      public Map<Coordinate,ObjectCard> getGrid()
      Gets the grid of the board
      Returns:
      the grid to get

    • setGrid

      public void setGrid(Map<Coordinate,ObjectCard> grid)
      Sets the grid of the board
      Parameters:
      grid - the grid to set

    • removeObjectCard

      public ObjectCard removeObjectCard(Coordinate coordinate)
      Remove the ObjectCard from the board at the specified coordinate.
      Parameters:
      coordinate - The coordinate of the ObjectCard to remove.
      Returns:
      The ObjectCard that was removed, or null if there was no ObjectCard at the given coordinate.

    • createCell

      public boolean createCell(Coordinate coord, ObjectCard card) throws NullPointerException, IllegalArgumentException
      Create a new cell of the board with the given coordinate and object card.
      Parameters:
      coord - The coordinate of the cell to create.
      card - The object card to place at the cell's coordinate.
      Returns:
      True if the cell is successfully created and added to the board, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - If the coordinate is null.
      IllegalArgumentException - If the object card is null.

    • isEmptyAtDirection

      public boolean isEmptyAtDirection(Coordinate coord, Board.Direction direction)
      Checks if there is no ObjectCard in the specified direction from the given coordinate.
      Parameters:
      coord - The coordinate of the ObjectCard to check.
      direction - The direction in which to check for an empty cell (UP, DOWN, LEFT, or RIGHT).
      Returns:
      True if there is no ObjectCard in the specified direction from the given coordinate, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the direction parameter is invalid.
